sentences.chinese: 利爵弗啐也，成事俎弗嘗也，三侑之弗食也。
sentences.literal: Beneficial wine not sip, completed affairs stand not taste, three toasts not eat.

sentences.chinese: 大昏之未廢齊也，大廟之未內尸也，始絕之未小斂，一也。
sentences.literal: Great marriage not yet abolish fast, great temple not yet enter corpse, beginning mourning not yet small dressing, one.

sentences.chinese: 大路之素幬也，郊之麻絻，喪服之先散麻，一也。
sentences.literal: Great carriage plain canopy, suburban hemp cap, mourning garments first scattered hemp, one.

sentences.chinese: 三年哭之不反也，清廟之歌一倡而三嘆，縣一鐘尚拊膈，朱弦而通越，一也。
sentences.literal: Three years weeping not return, pure temple song one lead three sigh, hang one bell still pat frame, vermilion strings pass zither, one.

sentences.chinese: 凡禮始乎脫，成乎文，終乎稅。
sentences.literal: All rites begin with removal, complete with pattern, end with return.
Therefore utmost preparation, feelings patterns both exhausted;
Below that, return feelings to return great one.

sentences.chinese: 天地以合，日月以明，四時以序，星辰以行，江河以流，萬物以昌，好惡以節，喜怒以當。
sentences.literal: Heaven earth thus unite, sun moon thus bright, four seasons thus ordered, stars constellations thus move, rivers thus flow, ten thousand things thus flourish, likes dislikes thus regulated, joy anger thus appropriate.

sentences.chinese: 以為下則順，以為上則明。
sentences.literal: Use as below then compliant, use as above then clear.

sentences.chinese: 立隆以為極，而天下莫之能益損也。
sentences.literal: Establish flourishing as extreme, and realm none able increase decrease it.

sentences.chinese: 本末相順，終始相應，至文有以辨，至察有以說。
sentences.literal: Root tip mutually compliant, end beginning mutually respond, utmost pattern has to distinguish, utmost discernment has to explain.

sentences.chinese: 天下從之者治，不從者亂；
sentences.literal: Realm follow it ordered, not follow chaotic;
Follow it secure, not follow dangerous.
